result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jevon Christopher Terry

records.addlTxt: Received and Filed: Attorney Timothy Baldwin

Adjustment Number: 22A 099514,
Payable Number: 1039738,
Receipt Number: 22RP041931,
Amount: $20.00

Defendant Jevon Christopher Terry in court.  Attorney Manuel Galang in court for Jevon Christopher Terry.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a Doctor's Report Return.  Attorney Galang recently appointed by the State Public Defender's Office.  However, Mr. Terry privately retained counsel.  Court rescheduled the matter.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Report 10.20.22
Received and Filed: Competency Report Dated 10-17-22
Received and Filed: Attorney Manuel Galang
Competency Examination scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 1:00pm with Dr. Seiple, 821 W State St - Suite 504 in the Safety Building.

Defendant Jevon Christopher Terry in court in person.  Attorney Timothy Baldwin appeared in court in person for Jevon Christopher Terry. Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.

COMP
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Report 9.22.22
Received and Filed: OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report

Defendant Jevon Christopher Terry in court in person with Attorney Fred Richardson who appears by video.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant. Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Jevon Christopher Terry in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Defendant Jevon Christopher Terry in custody.  Anthony White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jevon Christopher Terry appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
